alert.note: Alert for Mitchell; Osborne; Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 8:57AM CST until December 26 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...SIGNIFICANT WINTER STORM LIKELY CHRISTMAS DAY THROUGH TUESDAY NIGHT... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM CST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches. Northwest winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Mitchell, Osborne, and Rooks Counties in north central Kansas. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 6 PM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Even at this shorter forecast time range, there is still above-average uncertainty in the snowfall forecast, and the latest computer trends suggest that many places could end up near the lower end of the expected accumulation range.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
